ygData.subject: Re: Strange Item...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok now that is too freaking weird.  The same thing happened to me tonite.  A higher level druid friend of mine offered me one also.  She said she got it from
ygData.messageBody:
Ok now that is too freaking weird. The same thing happened to me tonite. A
higher level druid friend of mine offered me one also. She said she got it
from Guk, I think that is where she said she got it so don't quote me on
that. I had to log out and never got a chance to meet up with her. Any
info on it would be appreciated.

Kurik
19th Bard
Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: G2 Dan [mailto:drockwell@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 10:44 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Strange Item...
>
>
> From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
>
>
> I had a player offer me a Lizard Scale Fife. It looks like a wooden flute
> thought it doesn't specify BRD or anything on it. Anyone got any info on
> this item?
>
> Gediprime
> Xegony
>
